defined_controls.name: Shadow Model Deployment
defined_controls.description: Deploy a redundant AI model (e.g., previous stable version or simpler heuristic) running in parallel, used for anomaly detection and potential fallback.

defined_controls.name: Automatic Fallback to Scheduled Maintenance
defined_controls.description: If AI prediction confidence drops or system fails, automatically revert to a time-based or usage-based scheduled maintenance regime for critical components.

defined_controls.name: Human Expert Alert Queue
defined_controls.description: Route high-severity or uncertain AI alerts to a human expert queue for manual review and decision-making.

defined_controls.name: Sensor Data Anomaly Detection (Preprocessing)
defined_controls.description: Implement anomaly detection algorithms on raw sensor data streams to detect corruption or outliers before feeding to the main AI model.

defined_controls.name: Model Performance Monitoring & Alerting
defined_controls.description: Continuously monitor AI model's prediction drift, accuracy metrics, and inference latency, with automated alerts for degradation.

defined_controls.name: Data Pipeline Health Checks
defined_controls.description: Regular health checks and monitoring for data ingestion and feature engineering pipelines, ensuring data flow integrity.

defined_controls.name: Revert to Heuristic-Based Prediction
defined_controls.description: In case of primary AI model failure or severe degradation, switch to a simpler, rule-based heuristic for RUL prediction (e.g., based on fixed thresholds).
